The OpenTELEMAC forum's terms and conditions explicitly allow use of unaltere
versions of any uploaded documents as long as the source is clearly referenced:
    
    > Documents from this website may be used, provided that (1) such Document
    > will not be copied or posted on any network computer or broadcast in an
    > media without explicit mention of its source, and (2) no modifications of
    > any Documents are made.
